[[Caxton Ford (Earth-616)|Caxton J. Ford]] was a reporter for the New York Bulletin, he had previously worked for the [[Daily Bugle]], and covered the [[Thor: God of Thunder Vol 1 24|Broxton incident]], he was currently investigating [[Roxxon Energy Corporation (Earth-616)|Roxxon]].{{r|AXIS: Revolutions Vol 1 2}}
